sqlMap.statement: SELECT NET_ID,STCR FROM T13_MFA_STCR WHERE NET_ID = #net_id#
SELECT count(*) FROM T13_MFA_STCR WHERE NET_ID = #net_id#
SELECT count(*) FROM T13_MFA_STCR WHERE NET_ID = #net_id# AND STCR=#stcr#

SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STCR,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,B.PARTY_ID,B.ACCT_NUM,B.AMT,B.ORGANKEY,B.PARTY_CHN_NAME,B.TX_DT,B.TX_NO,B.DEBIT_CREDIT,B.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,B.CURRENCY_CD,B.OPP_NAME,B.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS A ,T47_TRANSACTION B WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=B.TRANSACTIONKEY UNION SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STCR,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,C.PARTY_ID,C.ACCT_NUM,C.AMT,C.ORGANKEY,C.PARTY_CHN_NAME,C.TX_DT,C.TX_NO,C.DEBIT_CREDIT,C.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,C.CURRENCY_CD,C.OPP_NAME,C.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS A ,T47_TRANSACTION_UH C WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=C.TRANSACTIONKEY ) WHERE NET_ID = #net_id# AND STCR=#stcr#
SELECT TRANSACTIONKEY, PARTY_ID AS party_id_MA, PARTY_CLASS_CD AS party_class_cd_MA, CURR_CD AS curr_cd_MA, TRANS_AMT AS amt, TX_DT FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS WHERE NET_ID = #net_id#

SELECT count(*) FROM( SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STCR,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,B.PARTY_ID,B.ACCT_NUM,B.AMT,B.ORGANKEY,B.PARTY_CHN_NAME,B.TX_DT,B.TX_NO,B.DEBIT_CREDIT,B.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,B.CURRENCY_CD,B.OPP_NAME,B.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS A ,T47_TRANSACTION B WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=B.TRANSACTIONKEY UNION SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STCR,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,C.PARTY_ID,C.ACCT_NUM,C.AMT,C.ORGANKEY,C.PARTY_CHN_NAME,C.TX_DT,C.TX_NO,C.DEBIT_CREDIT,C.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,C.CURRENCY_CD,C.OPP_NAME,C.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS A ,T47_TRANSACTION_UH C WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=C.TRANSACTIONKEY ) WHERE NET_ID = #net_id# AND STCR=#stcr#
DELETE FROM T13_MFA_STCR WHERE NET_ID=#net_id# AND STCR=#stcr#
SELECT STCRKEY AS stcr, PBC_DES FROM T07_PBCRULE

DELETE FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS WHERE NET_ID=#net_id# AND STCR=#stcr#
TRANSACTIONKEY=#transactionkey#
SELECT count(*) FROM T13_MFA_STCR_TRANS WHERE NET_ID = #net_id# AND STCR=#stcr# AND TRANSACTIONKEY=#transactionkey#

SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STATUS,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,B.PARTY_ID,B.ACCT_NUM,B.AMT,B.ORGANKEY,B.PARTY_CHN_NAME,B.PARTY_CLASS_CD,B.TX_DT,B.TX_NO,B.DEBIT_CREDIT,B.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,B.CURRENCY_CD,B.CURR_CD,B.OPP_NAME,B.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_TRANS_REL A ,T47_TRANSACTION B WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=B.TRANSACTIONKEY UNION SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STATUS,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,C.PARTY_ID,C.ACCT_NUM,C.AMT,C.ORGANKEY,C.PARTY_CHN_NAME,C.PARTY_CLASS_CD,C.TX_DT,C.TX_NO,C.DEBIT_CREDIT,C.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,C.CURRENCY_CD,C.CURR_CD,C.OPP_NAME,C.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_TRANS_REL A ,T47_TRANSACTION_UH C WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=C.TRANSACTIONKEY ) WHERE NET_ID=#net_id# AND STATUS IN ('1','2')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STATUS,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,B.PARTY_ID,B.ACCT_NUM,B.AMT,B.ORGANKEY,B.PARTY_CHN_NAME,B.PARTY_CLASS_CD,B.TX_DT,B.TX_NO,B.DEBIT_CREDIT,B.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,B.CURRENCY_CD,B.CURR_CD,B.OPP_NAME,B.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_TRANS_REL A ,T47_TRANSACTION B WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=B.TRANSACTIONKEY UNION SELECT A.NET_ID,A.STATUS,A.TRANSACTIONKEY,C.PARTY_ID,C.ACCT_NUM,C.AMT,C.ORGANKEY,C.PARTY_CHN_NAME,C.PARTY_CLASS_CD,C.TX_DT,C.TX_NO,C.DEBIT_CREDIT,C.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,C.CURRENCY_CD,C.CURR_CD,C.OPP_NAME,C.HANDLE_STATUS_CD as status_cd FROM T13_MFA_TRANS_REL A ,T47_TRANSACTION_UH C WHERE A.TRANSACTIONKEY=C.TRANSACTIONKEY ) WHERE NET_ID=#net_id# AND STATUS IN ('1','2')

UPDATE T13_MFA_INFO SET CONCLUSION = #conclusion# ,NET_STATUS=#net_status#
FLOW_STATUS=#flow_status#
MAXTRANS_DT=#maxtrans_dt#
PARTY_ID=#party_id_MA#
PARTY_CLASS_CD=#party_class_cd_MA#
CURR_CD=#curr_cd_MA#
application_num=#application_num#
WHERE NET_ID=#net_id#
select application_num as net_id,view_mode,display_mode,is_new from T07_case_application where application_num=#net_id#
